text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, 'When you get a nosebleed, pinch the sides of your nose for about 10 minutes'—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I often hear about tapping the back of your head, but this is new to me! Worth a try!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I wish I'd conveniently get a nosebleed. Come to think of it, I remember getting a nosebleed once after running a lot before...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haaah... haaah... I'm not getting a nosebleed at all.
No matter how much she ran, Matikanetannhauser just got tired without getting a nosebleed...
